name: Habits
description:
Controls:

Use the A key or the left arrow key to move left.

Use the D key or the right arrow key to move right.

Press the Space bar to initiate conversation with a person.

Press S or the down arrow key to continue in the conversation with another person.

Press W or the up arrow key to go back to the last statement in a conversation with another person.

Give feedback here: https://goo.gl/forms/Tw8w2JSbJ7UydRKR2
